name: Scry
flavor: See through the eyes of a willing creature.

purposeDescriptions.low: linked sense. Targetted willing creatures may share short, messy fragments of their senses with you
purposeDescriptions.mid: linked sense. Targetted willing creatures may share any or all of their senses with you
purposeDescriptions.high: telepathic will. Targetted creatures share all of their senses with you, and their actions may be vaguely controlled by you
